title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
inscribed:
1. On rock behind the huntsmen, " Vue et site de la valee de Munster en Alsace"
2. At left under the building, "Manufacture de Munster".
dimensions:
Warp: 109 cm (42 7/8 in.)
Weft: 86.5 cm (34 in.)
Width of plate: 85 cm (33 3/8 in.)
Height of repeat: 60 cm (right selvedge only).
description: Pastoral scenes and scenes of hunters with the hartmann manufactory at the extreme right. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-172.
